root.name: Don't Buy This
root.description: The GamesFido Race AcePilot one of nine racers around a single track. The game is won by pulling into first place. Weasel WillyIn this game you must navigate around trees in a park which are placed at random. Fido Control a dog and try to whack moles with your tail. You must replenish your energy occasionally by going to your food bowl. You must also avoid birds by ducking when they come. Fruit Machine Fido 2 Puppy Power This game is very similar to the first. One difference is that there is no food bowl this time, but there is still energy, so there is no way to survive. The other difference is that occasionally one of five objects may chase him and kill him. Fruit Machine In this game you use your single pound and you play a slot machine.
